sentences.english: This practice has nothing to do with the nation or society you live in.
sentences.chinese: 修行者也完全沒有要治國，甚至平天下的宏願。

sentences.english: K. O.: Well, of course, there are certain markets where our ambition level is much higher than what the reality is today.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，確實，有些市場的表現目前還達不到我們的宏願。

sentences.english: Its ambition is to join the club of industrial nations by 2020.
sentences.chinese: 它的宏願是在2020年加入發達國家俱樂部。

sentences.english: The second, which they largely avoid, is the question of relevance to Darwin’s grand vision.
sentences.chinese: 其次，他們極力要避免對於達爾文的“宏願”的質疑。

definition: to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
see 承前啟後|承前启后[cheng2 qian2 qi3 hou4]
to pass on the light of Buddha
unity of will is an impregnable stronghold (idiom)
to abandon suffering and obtain happiness (Buddhism)
see 念念不忘[nian4 nian4 bu4 wang4]
millions of people all of one mind (idiom); the people united
to be at the highest level of enlightenment (Buddhist expression)
to extend all over the globe (idiom)/far-reaching
to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages
